latest_revision.text:
Overall, this looks very good. However: *Preformatted text doesn't wrap, making for a side-scrolling page; no good. **Wikified the format to make it easier to read. [[User:Will|Will]] 05:19, 7 February 2012 (UTC) *FAQ are answered in first-person, but don't specify who "I" is. *Conversational tone of FAQ answers is distracting. If you want me to make the formatting changes, let me know.
-- Nate Plamondon 20110825 16:55
